General.Name: Cecep Environmental Protection Equipment Co Ltd
General.Description: CECEP Environmental Protection Equipment Co.,Ltd. engages in the energy-saving and environmental protection equipment and electrical special equipment business worldwide. It is involved in the research, design, development, manufacturing, sale, and service of treatment equipment for multiple processes of sewage treatment, including urban sewage, tap water, industrial wastewater, sludge treatment and disposal, garbage, kitchen leachate treatment, and rural sewage treatment. The company also provides waste incineration power generation equipment; energy-efficient equipment; environmental pollution prevention and control equipment; and transformer special equipment and transformer components, such as iron core cutting equipment, winding equipment, oil tank equipment, fin radiators, etc. In addition, it offers high-voltage equipment comprising partial discharge power frequency transformers, series resonance test devices, impulse voltage generators, impulse current generators, DC generators, switch synthesis high current test devices, shunt compensating reactors, impulse high current generators for short circuit tests, cable boosters, high frequency spark devices, intermediate transformers, etc. Further, the company provides quality inspection technical, environmental protection monitoring, and environmental testing technical services; and big data services. Its products are primarily used for the high-voltage product tests of institutions of higher learning, State Grid Electric Power Research Institute, high-voltage testing units, etc., as well as product factory type tests of transformers, switches, cables, bushings, and other enterprises. The company was formerly known as Xi'an Qiyuan Mechanical and Electrical Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to CECEP Environmental Protection Equipment Co., Ltd. in February 2017. CECEP Environmental Protection Equipment Co., Ltd. is based in Xi'an, China.
